description_en: Forged in the echoing dark of the Abyss, this blade hums with the souls it has devoured. Those who wield it hear whispers from beyond the veil.
Crafted from the venom glands and scales of a hydra, the crown exudes a toxic aura. Even blood recoils at its silent corrosion.
Harvested from a colossal slime, this gelatinous shell bends yet resists piercing blows, as if still faintly alive.
A crude blade carved from bone. Fragile, but sharp enough to end a life before it splinters.
Shaped from a goblin chieftainâ€™s fang, it strikes swiftlyâ€”almost cunningly.
A fang taken from a wild alpha. Its bearer swears they can hear distant howls on the wind.
Woven from cavern spider silk, these boots leave barely a trace with each step.
Forged from shattered golem stone, it bears the lingering will of a silent guardian.
A crystallized ember from a fire imp. Warm to the touch, and eager to ignite.
Carved from the skull of a frost wolf alpha, it chills even the wearerâ€™s breath.
Infused with the feathers of a thunder eagle, they crackle faintly with kinetic energy.
Sealed with dormant plague spores, the ring exhales a faint rot when turned.
Reforged from the ashes of an ancient battlefield, it carries the memory of unquenched war.
A relic of the night wardens, said to have withstood the first surge from the Abyssal Gate.
Crafted for relentless hunters. The wind seems to part before each stride.
Its gem resembles the pupil of the Abyss. Stare too long, and it seems to stare back.
Awarded to those who step first into the unknown. The greatest dangers make no sound.
